author: Kate Cox
title: Missouri attorney general tries suing China to recoup COVID-19 losses
description: Missouri is the first state to try it but will probably not be the last.
content:
Enlarge/ St. Louis, Missouri, back before everything was cancelled due to coronavirus.
2 with 2 posters participating
The pandemic is a challenge for all of us. The economic knock-on effects of the health crisis are, themselves, another crisis. Many people,… [+3949 chars]
